revision.text:
Eat Pant was taken so I suppose this one will have to do. Whoever you are, person that took the original, I salute you.
What? You want me to prove I'm the real one? Eh... That's hard... Let me think about it... Ok, how about this... if you go on the Discord and ask for The Pant Man and Eat Pant answers then... Oh, I guess that proves nothing.
Ok, how about I actually tell you something about me here? Give me a moment...
*Creator of '''[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZeJlMdIb2baw48701_RzrErzaiwqPSEh/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=115728836020691915561&rtpof=true&sd=true| All Challenges Pantlock Run]''' -> Do all regional achievements, as orderly as possible, before moving to next region. Yes, that includes ''shinies''. *Currently suffering with '''7C Poison (now rebranded to 8C Poison thanks to EVs)''' -> Beat the game only catching Poison Pok√©mon.
